review: After taking the meditation, 1pc 30mg.My wrist and feet are swollen, can't walk anymore. Also sharp pain around my heart.

I’ve had gastritis before after an emotional & tragic event in my life I was put on omeprazole that did help but this time after yet another event gastritis has returned I’ve been taking ranitidine 150mg but although it’s helped my doctor has advidee me to take lansoprazole 30mg I'm  yet to get. I do to have an endoscopy soon last time they found grade 2 erosion

I am currently taking lansoprazole to treat gastritis for a second time. The first time, I took the medication for a month which seemed to clear my symptoms. After another flare-up, I am back on lansoprazole.So far so good - the medication has been very effective. I have been suffering from constant bloating and stomach discomfort, and lansoprazole has massively reduced both.
These meds are helpful with heartburn and reflux but not for stomach inflammation and cramping pain
